column1: The Purple Pig////The worst part was the octopus
column2: which was so incredibly acidic that it wasn't edible. It was like eating a lemon. Every component of the dish was acidic
column3: there was no balance in flavors. Our waitress was very nice and sent it back
column4: giving us the option to have the beets instead
column5: which ended up being our favorite dish. The pecan butter that came with it was honestly my favorite part of the meal.
